#summary Outline of the project

= Introduction =

Umbra Engine is a voxel engine.
----

= Details =

Umbra Engine was started March 1 2011. It is currently using XNA libraries, but we aim to port it to using an OpenGL library such as OpenTK or SFML for release.
----

= Main Aspects=

These are the main aspects of the engine:
 * [LandscapeGeneration Landscape generation]
 * [RenderingOverview Voxel rendering]
 * [Physics Physics]
 * [ChunkManagement Chunk management]
----
